DEAN.raw_line: What time is it baby?She probably just went out for a run. She'll be back soon because she's going to get thirsty.You know what we should do? We should leave her bowl full of water and her dish full of food. Because she's gotta get hungry and thirsty sometime. You know?Like me. I'm hungry. I'm so hungry I could eat your toes.We're hungry! We're going to eat you.Don't laugh. Come on, don't laugh!What happened to the flute?Here... we can make it taste better.This is how a leopard eats.Are you gonna listen to your mother? I think you better.How old are you?Okay, eat five bites.We gotta get a dishwasher...I'll do it. Come on let me do it.Put your seat belt on.C'mon. What's the big deal?Watch...Slow that piece of shit down!God's a woman and she's pissed off at me.Didn't think you were gonna make it.Almost. Her class is coming up.You have a good day?Anything good happen?Is something wrong?Why don't you tell me?Why do you gotta make me beg? I know there's something wrong. It's gonna come out eventually. Just tell me.That's great, where?Where?I told you you gotta close that fucking gate.I'm sorry. It's not your fault.You were great.No. But... I was thinking... Maybe she got a job or something... You know? So she could make some money and buy some food. Or maybe she moved out to Hollywood to become a movie dog!I was thinking...you should have some fun tonight1 Don't you think?What? I can't smoke around his oxygen.Hey leopard. You be good now. You remember what to do when Pa snores?That's my girl. Gimme a squeezer.Hey man... Can I have a slice of that pie?It's fucking pee!How could you live like this?Look how handsome he was.Wait up. We gotta do this right...You are gonna be the new stud in this place.We'll tell her Monday. After the weekend. Let's not ruin her Holiday.You remember where we put...Here! Let's get the fuck out of here.Taking us away. We gotta get outta this house. It's still good? Good... Well, what rooms do you got?...Hold on a minute...What room do you want? The North Pole, the Moon Room or Cupid's cave. Which one?I don't want to hear any excuses. We're going. We deserve it. One night. Because we belong to each other. Pick a room.You're not going to decide? I'll decide. That's how decisions get made.Come on let's go get drunk.Give us the moon room. Periera. P-E-R-I- E-R-A... 2... Great...Pack our bags. We're going to the moon!You're drivin'?Alright, lead foot. It's not a race.Do you mind if I turn this back on?Let's just see if there's something on...Anything? Fuck it.That's better. You're right. It never gets to be just quiet. You know?What are you thinking about?Did you get everything?Where d'you get these?Try em' on.You look like your mom.You get any snacks?Which bag?Mmm. These are good.You can't wait? We're almost there.Goddamnit Cindy!! Pay attention!!!You do. No, you do. I know that you do. And the reason that I know that you do is - I have stolen money before... a lot of it. And I know what it feels like to have someone look at you like that...The way your lookin'. Just so you know, I have a job where I make money. Money that I can take girls out on dates with.Maybe...Can I give you my number or something.Wow. Where are we?Cynthia!Now watch.See. I tol' ya. It's falling out!Oooooooooh shiiiiiiit!Is that Francis? Hey!? Don't hang up until I talk to her!Are you ready to go to sleep now? I'll call you first thing in the morning, OK?How much?...Well, I love you more. Sleep tight.What are you doing?Do you like the place?I'm gonna go order dinner now.Any special requests?What does it look like I'm doing?I remember the first time I saw your back.Everything.I wasn't done.Getting thinner, isn't it?I know. I love you.I'll do it.Wait, I didn't wash your hair...We have neighbors.Thanks.Maybe...Anyone call for me?I just keep replaying it in my head. Thinking about other things I coulda done. Other things I coulda said.You wait your whole life for something to happen... Blue Valentine Official Green Script as of 6/9/09 39A....And you have all these ideas in your head about how you'll act and what you'll say and what you'll do, who you'll be...Hi. I was looking for your neighbor... the man who moved in last month. Across the hall. Do you know what happened to him?What about the girl that was with you?Hi.I just had a long talk with your gramma... is that, is that your gramma?I was looking for that old guy who moved across the hall, you know? Do you know what happened to him?That's exactly what happened to my dog. My parents moved out of our house and three days later she was a goner.He was so handsome, wasn't he? I was trying to give it back to him.She must have been crazy.Cause there's one thing I know... the prettier a girl is the more nuts she is. I mean, look at you... you must be insane.It's okay, I mean, I get it. It's not your fault.Where you going?Can I walk with you?Just for a little bit... And when you don't want to walk with me no more, then just speed up.Where's you house?Where?Do you think it would be okay if I looked in your purse?Why?Jeez... What you got in here?Lot of books. You doing good?What are you gonna be when you grow up?You going to be a doctor?Oh yeah? What should I do about this?Mmm. This is what you smell like?I wanna smell like you. Can I?This is what your lips smell like? They must smell good.Mmm. Your lips must taste good.No. Blue Valentine Official Green Script as of 6/9/09 45.What's in there?Why?Probably. I think I... I think I already did. It's okay. There's an early one.Until you get tired...Where'd you grow up?Here?Where do you want to go? I mean, if you could go anywhere..Oh God... I hate these things.What happened, tough guy?You gotta puke... it's the only way.It's the only way. It will make you feel better. Don't be embarrassed. I'll do it.Me too.Yeah. We're flying.You should come visit me in the city sometime.To honesty...Hey! Wait up.How is it?Great. She's the best.Naw. She's the champ. She's the best parts of you and the best parts of me put together. Everyday she gets more and more amazing.She's not mine. I'm hers.I'm her father. She isn't there for me... I'm there for her. That's the way I look at it.It's the choice I made when she was born.Like what?What am I supposed to want to do?I just wanna be with you.You look like an animal right now. Your eyes look like an animal. Like a bear's eyes.Yeah... You do. It's true. That's what you look like.Whatchu thinking about?Different?You think that's good that we're different?And that's the way you like it, don't you? You don't like me to bother you.Well there's not much space here. So I guess you won't be able to get away from me will ya?If you're not interested in hearing what I think I just won't say anything.OK. I'm going to say something. And what I'm about to say I've thought long and hard about. I'm the luckiest person alive because I'm living my dream - you, her, this, us, all of it.What's wrong with that?That's the flavor. Eat it.My tits? I got tits?I could still kick yer ass.A dime and you're on.I'm always ready, baby.Come on. Go! Start.Oh fuck.Hold still.You think we should rush you to the hospital before you bleed to death?Does it hurt?Wait wait wait.To numb the pain. Doctors orders. I'm an anesthesiologist.Drink up. We haven't gotten loaded together in years.I gotta take a piss. Don't fall asleep.I fell over.Nope, I want you to come here first. I want you to laugh.Come close. I want to hear you... I want to tell you... Shh, come here...You want to hear a joke? OK. What's better than winning a gold medal at the Special Olympics?Not being retarded.Hey...that's not funny? How come you don't think I'm funny any more? I tell you something funny. You laugh. I see you laugh. But you don't really laugh so much. You don't laugh anymore Cindy.No I want to make you laugh.Hello...No, I'm just still in love with you.Do you... you want to have another baby? ... I want another child.What!? I can't have sex with my wife!?Do I repulse you that much? I'm good to you. I'm good to Frankie. I deserve a little affection. Do you want me to stop loving you? Do you want me to fuck other women? Do you want me to beat you?Is that what you think you deserve? Would that make it easier on you so you can treat me like this?I'm sorry...I'm sorry...I'm sorry...Yes.Sure.I don't know. Let me go check.I don't know... Should I go see if he brushed his teeth?Be quiet! Seriously. He's gonna kill me. He already hates me.Are you okay?Is it mine?You let that asshole knock you up?When'd this happen?What do you want to do?We'll keep it. We'll take care of it.Do you want to take care of it?You're not in this alone. This baby is ours. It's us. Let's start a family.Cynthia!Hello?OK.Was she with a guy?Who's askin'?I think you're a fucking idiot.Never.Hello?Where's my wife?I'm not sick.There's nothing wrong with me.Where's my wife?Cynthia. Where is she?Yeah, are you deaf or are you just dumb?Saved you a trip.I got a ride.- I was going out of my mind. I didn't know if there's an emergency. I didn't know if Francis was hurt. Did you think about that?Taking pictures?Last night got fucked up, OK? I know it. I know I'm lazy, I eat too much, I drink too much, I drive you crazy with all my jealous bullshit. I fuck up. I know I'm clumsy. But you're not trying anymore.Please don't make me be alone.I'm OK.Yeah. Let's go.You don't think about anyone but yourself. Do you?You got no time for me anymore. It all goes to this fucking job. Blue Valentine Official Green Script as of 6/9/09 77.You! What about me? I gave up everything for you.Take what? What can't you take... The truth? I know you can't... You never could.Who is it?Wait a second...Get up.I know!I didn't know if it was pot luck so I brought an eggplant.Face looks like an eggplant, don't it? How you doing sir, I'm Dean.I stole these for you.No. It feels good. Keep doing it.Maybe I should go.I'm going to miss my train.Okay.I love you.Really?Are your parent's gonna walk in on us?Hey sweetheart.Do you want to get out of my way.Keep an eye on Francis.We're not alone here Cynthia. We have a little girl. We need to think about her.All you're thinking about is yourself. You. Francis is gonna grow up in a broken home and that's OK with you.Don't love each other? I've only ever loved you....Cynthia...Cynthia...Thank you...Daddy's gonna go now, OK.

CINDY.raw_line: I'm sleeping!C'mon, eat, you can't be late today.Come on Frankie, use a spoon. You know how to use a spoon.Frankie! We're leaving in 15. Eat!Alright...Look up for mommy... come on Frankie! We're gonna be late... look up....Love you.Sorry...I'm almost done.Yeah... I'm going to.I know I know. I should know for sure by Monday.I will.Do you want to know the sex?Oh no...Did I miss her?It was alright... Busy.I found Megan.Over on Urbandale... near Spur.Aren't you coming up?He's an old man.Go say goodbye to Daddy. You're not going to see him until tomorrow.Come on silly. Let's go in and get dry.You don't have to. Let's just go in.What are we going to tell her?She would have wanted to say goodbye. Blue Valentine Official Green Script as of 6/9/09 16.What are you doing?You're crazy.Bobby Ontario?That's a strange question to ask someone you haven't seen in forever.Yes.Yes...I haven't. I mean I have...I have been...Why are you looking at me like that?Oh OK.Who's this?Wow...I know...I'm really happy for you.She's good.SHE'S GOT-You go...Oh... I was going to say, you ask her what kind of hair she's got and she says, a bob. It's pretty funny.Frankie.Oh...I'm sorry.How much was the vodka?Can I put that back? I'm sorry...Nothankyou. Just take it off please.Let's go.Isn't it funny how you can be driving for 20 minutes and it feels like you've only been driving for 20 seconds. The time just gets swallowed up somewhere...I was kind of enjoying the silence.Think so.There should be some fig newtons back there.You have to look.I have to pee.I gotta go....Hello?Research.Quads can't use their arms. I'm a paraplegic.I can't. I have to go get gramma.Get down Napoleon! Get down!Just us.It's OK mom.It's not bad.Shit!Give em!Take a deep whiff, you fucking douchebag!It looks like you have a new neighbor.No, Gramma, you're in bed now. It's bedtime. Do you want me to keep reading?Okay, shhh. But you gotta be quiet.No.Like what?Are you trying to pick up on me?...it's just Dean... he's losing his hair. What are you guys doing?Lemme talk to the little one.Did Pa make you something to eat yet? ...Frankie? ...What'd you and Pa eat? ...Was it cooked all the way through? No pink in there? ...Okay sweetheart, your daddy wants to talk to you. I love you... love you... Don't forget to brush your teeth tonight okay. Okay? Here's your dad.What does it look like I'm doing?It's fine.Fine!Close the door!What are you doing?Dean.What do you remember?Okay.Give me the soap.Turn around.Your hair is not falling out.You're crazy you know...Okay, get out. I have to finish washing myself.No. Go order dinner. I'm hungry.Grump. Grump.Why don't you put some music on Dean?Hi.I think he passed away.She was pretty too..Why do you say that?Excuse me?Home.We passed it.Back there...No.Books. Mostly.We'll see.I'm trying to get into med school.Someday.Don't do it.You wanna put on my lotion?Are you fucking with me?Okay enough...Because.Aren't you gonna miss your train?You are just gonna stay up all night?Here.Same streets. Same people. Everything here is the same. You walk down the street, you can't get lost... you know. Blue Valentine Official Green Script as of 6/9/09 46.There!I used to love these things.Push me.Get on!Make it stop.I'm still spinning.Maybe it's just the Earth that's spinning.We're toasting tonight?Sometimes you don't make any sense. You might as well be speaking Chinese.Happy belated anniversary.Good. How did Frankie sound?She didn't sound sad?Daddy's little girl.That's beautiful.Why don't you do something...I don't know... isn't there anything you want to do?I don't know... You have so many things you could do. You're good at everything. You could do anything you wanted.Like right before the bear eats the man?How different we are. You and me.It's a good thing.Absolutely. We don't have to get in each other's way.I didn't say that. What I meant is that it's important for us to have our space. That's all. We're grown people.You know, we rarely sit down and have a conversation. An adult conversation. Because every time we do, you turn something that I say around and make it mean something that I didn't mean to say. You just blab. Blab.Good luck. I just want you to think about what you say sometimes instead of saying what you think all the time.I think my glass has a hole in it.It's fat.I don't want to. You eat it.That's going straight to your tits.Shiiit. I bet you a nickel you can't even beat me at arm wrestling.Ready?On the count of three... One... Two...THREE!I'm alright.Ow ow ow.It stings a little.No, no... Put me down. It's okay...I'm spinning.What are you doing in there? ...Dean?!Are you all right? Dean...Ew. Come on, get up.What?Dean... Come on, it's time for bed.You're drunk.No... Dean... Wait a second.Stop... stop... stop...Are my hands cold?You wanna go somewhere.Where can we go?Is your roommate awake?Do you think he's gonna come out?You think he's gonna go to sleep now?Just a second...Give it back!I... I don't know... It might be......I'm sorry...I'm sorry...Before us.I don't know.It's not the right time.Okay...Yeah.I'm a student...I'm studying to be a DOCTOR...What's that?Because... I always thought... it would be wonderful to take a sick child and......heal them...Wait... wait.Your eyes ever wide open, and you're dreaming?You smell like you.Shit.Goodbye.Mediplex... You are going to need to come in... We're going to need to see him... I can't diagnose over the phone... About 20- 30 minutes... Okay? ...okay, bye...Right this way.Have a seat on the table, Mrs. Guevara.Do you speak English? Hablas Ingles?Poquito?Yo tabien. De donde eres tu?So...Tu famalia esta aqui? Here?They're in El Salvador?Uh...Sola...Alone.But hopefully not lonely.So you're feeling some pain in your left breast. Uh...Tu dueles en tu chiche?Well let's take a look.Can you take off tu ropas and pongas... put this on? Okay? Comprende?Lo siento mi Espanol es muy mal.A woman in 215. Hispanic. 53. Lives alone. Complaining of pain in her left breast.Oh yeah?I'm married.I don't remember asking you for help.What's the problem, Maria? Tu sabes?No comprende? Necessita take off tu comisitas. Your shirt. Understand?Por favor, Maria. Come on.Oh my God. Jesus Christ. Maria...Maria! Que eso? Why didn't you come in sooner? Why did you wait this long?! Eso es muy mal. Very bad.How could you look at yourself in the mirror and pretend it's not there? How long have you been pretending?Her breast. Her breast!It's probably been growing for years!Dean?I can see that. How'd you get here?Frankie's fine...We're not going to do this here.Live your life.Help me.Are you drunk?Can you drive?No, you go. Take the car home.You know how many sacrifices I make every day.I never asked you to! I can't take this shit anymore.You're right Dean, I can't take the truth...I've had it with the truth or whatever it is you make up along the way and label as truth... You win. I give up... I've been lying to you for a long time.It's me, Dean. I didn't want to hurt you. But I'm not the person you fell in love with. And you won't let me be anything but that person. That's why I can't look at you. Because every time I do I can't stop thinking about how much I want you to hate me. But you're too stupid to see it, and too chicken shit to do anything about it.I don't love you anymore... Why can't you stop loving me?I'm sorry. I'm sorry. Let me see.You son of a bitch!Give me the keys.I want a divorce!Oh God.Are you okay?Does that hurt.Why? They'll stop soon.Good.Promise me one thing... you'll never let me become an adult.That motherfucker.I love you too.Yeah.They never come in here.Who had candy for breakfast? Blue Valentine Official Green Script as of 6/9/09 83.How was Frankie?I'm OK.I'm not coming home.I am thinking about her.I can't let her grow up in a home where her parents don't love each other.Let her go, Dad.
